-- See Hoogle, http://www.haskell.org/hoogle/


-- | Use the Hadoop RPC interface from Haskell.
--   
@package hadoop-rpc
@version 1.0.0.1

module Data.Hadoop.Protobuf.ProtocolInfo

-- | Request to get protocol versions for all supported rpc kinds.
data GetProtocolVersionsRequest
GetProtocolVersionsRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> GetProtocolVersionsRequest

-- | Protocol name
pvProtocol :: GetProtocolVersionsRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | Protocol version with corresponding RPC kind.
data ProtocolVersion
ProtocolVersion :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Repeated 2 (Value Word64) -> ProtocolVersion

-- | RPC kind
pvRpcKind :: ProtocolVersion -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | Protocol version corresponding to the rpc kind
pvVersions :: ProtocolVersion -> Repeated 2 (Value Word64)

-- | Get protocol version response.
data GetProtocolVersionsResponse
GetProtocolVersionsResponse :: Repeated 1 (Message ProtocolVersion) -> GetProtocolVersionsResponse
pvProtocolVersions :: GetProtocolVersionsResponse -> Repeated 1 (Message ProtocolVersion)

-- | Get protocol signature request
data GetProtocolSignatureRequest
GetProtocolSignatureRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Text) -> GetProtocolSignatureRequest

-- | Protocol name
psProtocol :: GetProtocolSignatureRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | RPC kind
psRpcKind :: GetProtocolSignatureRequest -> Required 2 (Value Text)

-- | Get protocol signature response
data GetProtocolSignatureResponse
GetProtocolSignatureResponse :: Repeated 1 (Message ProtocolSignature) -> GetProtocolSignatureResponse
psSignatures :: GetProtocolSignatureResponse -> Repeated 1 (Message ProtocolSignature)
data ProtocolSignature
ProtocolSignature :: Required 1 (Value Word64) -> Repeated 2 (Value Word32) -> ProtocolSignature
psVersion :: ProtocolSignature -> Required 1 (Value Word64)
psMethods :: ProtocolSignature -> Repeated 2 (Value Word32)
instance Generic GetProtocolVersionsRequest
instance Show GetProtocolVersionsRequest
instance Generic ProtocolVersion
instance Show ProtocolVersion
instance Generic GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Show GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Generic GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Show GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Generic ProtocolSignature
instance Show ProtocolSignature
instance Generic GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Show GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Datatype D1GetProtocolVersionsRequest
instance Constructor C1_0GetProtocolVersionsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0GetProtocolVersionsRequest
instance Datatype D1ProtocolVersion
instance Constructor C1_0ProtocolVersion
instance Selector S1_0_0ProtocolVersion
instance Selector S1_0_1ProtocolVersion
instance Datatype D1GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Constructor C1_0GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Datatype D1GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Constructor C1_0GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Selector S1_0_1GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Datatype D1ProtocolSignature
instance Constructor C1_0ProtocolSignature
instance Selector S1_0_0ProtocolSignature
instance Selector S1_0_1ProtocolSignature
instance Datatype D1GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Constructor C1_0GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Decode ProtocolSignature
instance Encode ProtocolSignature
instance Decode GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Encode GetProtocolSignatureResponse
instance Decode GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Encode GetProtocolSignatureRequest
instance Decode GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Encode GetProtocolVersionsResponse
instance Decode ProtocolVersion
instance Encode ProtocolVersion
instance Decode GetProtocolVersionsRequest
instance Encode GetProtocolVersionsRequest

module Data.Hadoop.Protobuf.Headers

-- | User information beyond what can be determined as part of the security
--   handshake at connection time (kerberos, tokens, etc)
data UserInformation
UserInformation :: Optional 1 (Value Text) -> Optional 2 (Value Text) -> UserInformation
effectiveUser :: UserInformation -> Optional 1 (Value Text)
realUser :: UserInformation -> Optional 2 (Value Text)

-- | The connection context is sent as part of the connection
--   establishment. It establishes the context for ALL Rpc calls within the
--   connection.
data IpcConnectionContext
IpcConnectionContext :: Optional 2 (Message UserInformation) -> Optional 3 (Value Text) -> IpcConnectionContext
ctxUserInfo :: IpcConnectionContext -> Optional 2 (Message UserInformation)

-- | Name of the next RPC layer.
ctxProtocol :: IpcConnectionContext -> Optional 3 (Value Text)

-- | Determines the RPC Engine and the serialization of the RPC request.
data RpcKind

-- | Used for built-in calls by tests
Builtin :: RpcKind

-- | Use WritableRpcEngine
Writable :: RpcKind

-- | Use ProtobufRpcEngine
ProtocolBuffer :: RpcKind
data RpcOperation

-- | The final RPC packet
FinalPacket :: RpcOperation

-- | Not implemented yet
ContinuationPacket :: RpcOperation

-- | Close the RPC connection
CloseConnection :: RpcOperation
data RpcRequestHeader
RpcRequestHeader :: Optional 1 (Enumeration RpcKind) -> Optional 2 (Enumeration RpcOperation) -> Required 3 (Value (Signed Int32)) -> Required 4 (Value ByteString) -> Optional 5 (Value (Signed Int32)) -> RpcRequestHeader
reqKind :: RpcRequestHeader -> Optional 1 (Enumeration RpcKind)
reqOp :: RpcRequestHeader -> Optional 2 (Enumeration RpcOperation)

-- | Sequence number that is sent back in response
reqCallId :: RpcRequestHeader -> Required 3 (Value (Signed Int32))

-- | Globally unique client ID
reqClientId :: RpcRequestHeader -> Required 4 (Value ByteString)

-- | Retry count, 1 means this is the first retry
reqRetryCount :: RpcRequestHeader -> Optional 5 (Value (Signed Int32))

-- | This message is the header for the Protobuf Rpc Engine when sending a
--   RPC request from RPC client to the RPC server. The actual request
--   (serialized as protobuf) follows this request.
--   
--   No special header is needed for the Rpc Response for Protobuf Rpc
--   Engine. The normal RPC response header (see RpcHeader.proto) are
--   sufficient.
data RequestHeader
RequestHeader :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Text) -> Required 3 (Value Word64) -> RequestHeader

-- | Name of the RPC method
reqMethodName :: RequestHeader -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | RPCs for a particular interface (ie protocol) are done using an IPC
--   connection that is setup using rpcProxy. The rpcProxy has a declared
--   protocol name that is sent from client to server at connection time.
--   
--   Each Rpc call also sends a protocol name (reqProtocolName). This name
--   is usually the same as the connection protocol name, but not always.
--   For example, meta protocols, such as ProtocolInfoProto, reuse the
--   connection but need to indicate that the actual protocol is different
--   (i.e. the protocol is ProtocolInfoProto) since they reuse the
--   connection; in this case the protocol name is set to
--   ProtocolInfoProto.
reqProtocolName :: RequestHeader -> Required 2 (Value Text)

-- | Protocol version of class declaring the called method.
reqProtocolVersion :: RequestHeader -> Required 3 (Value Word64)

-- | Success or failure. The reponse header's error detail, exception class
--   name and error message contains further details on the error.
data RpcStatus

-- | Succeeded
Success :: RpcStatus

-- | Non-fatal error, connection left open
Error :: RpcStatus

-- | Fatal error, connection closed
Fatal :: RpcStatus

-- | Note that RPC response header is also used when connection setup
--   fails. (i.e. the response looks like an RPC response with a fake
--   callId)
--   
--   In case of Fatal error then the respose contains the Serverside's IPC
--   version.
data RpcResponseHeader
RpcResponseHeader :: Required 1 (Value Word32) -> Required 2 (Enumeration RpcStatus) -> Optional 3 (Value Word32) -> Optional 4 (Value Text) -> Optional 5 (Value Text) -> Optional 6 (Enumeration Error) -> Optional 7 (Value ByteString) -> Optional 8 (Value Int32) -> RpcResponseHeader

-- | Call ID used in request
rspCallId :: RpcResponseHeader -> Required 1 (Value Word32)
rspStatus :: RpcResponseHeader -> Required 2 (Enumeration RpcStatus)

-- | v7: Sent if fatal v9: Sent if success or fail
rspServerIpcVersion :: RpcResponseHeader -> Optional 3 (Value Word32)

-- | If the request fails
rspExceptionClassName :: RpcResponseHeader -> Optional 4 (Value Text)

-- | If the request fails, often contains stack trace
rspErrorMsg :: RpcResponseHeader -> Optional 5 (Value Text)

-- | In case of error
rspErrorDetail :: RpcResponseHeader -> Optional 6 (Enumeration Error)

-- | Globally unique client ID
rspClientId :: RpcResponseHeader -> Optional 7 (Value ByteString)
rspRetryCount :: RpcResponseHeader -> Optional 8 (Value Int32)

-- | Describes why an RPC error occurred.
data Error

-- | RPC failed - RPC app threw exception
ErrorApplication :: Error

-- | RPC error - no such method
ErrorNoSuchMethod :: Error

-- | RPC error - no such protocol
ErrorNoSuchProtocol :: Error

-- | RPC error on server side
ErrorRpcServer :: Error

-- | Error serializing response
ErrorSerializingResponse :: Error

-- | RPC protocol version mismatch
ErrorRpcVersionMismatch :: Error

-- | RPC error that we don't know about
ErrorCode :: Int -> Error

-- | Unknown fatal error
FatalUnknown :: Error

-- | IPC layer serilization type invalid
FatalUnsupportedSerialization :: Error

-- | Fields of RPC header are invalid
FatalInvalidRpcHeader :: Error

-- | Could not deserialize RPC request
FatalDeserializingRequest :: Error

-- | IPC layer version mismatch
FatalVersionMismatch :: Error

-- | Auth failed
FatalUnauthorized :: Error

-- | Fatal error that we don't know about
FatalCode :: Int -> Error
instance Generic UserInformation
instance Show UserInformation
instance Generic IpcConnectionContext
instance Show IpcConnectionContext
instance Generic RpcKind
instance Show RpcKind
instance Enum RpcKind
instance Generic RpcOperation
instance Show RpcOperation
instance Enum RpcOperation
instance Generic RpcRequestHeader
instance Show RpcRequestHeader
instance Generic RequestHeader
instance Show RequestHeader
instance Generic RpcStatus
instance Show RpcStatus
instance Eq RpcStatus
instance Enum RpcStatus
instance Generic Error
instance Show Error
instance Generic RpcResponseHeader
instance Show RpcResponseHeader
instance Datatype D1UserInformation
instance Constructor C1_0UserInformation
instance Selector S1_0_0UserInformation
instance Selector S1_0_1UserInformation
instance Datatype D1IpcConnectionContext
instance Constructor C1_0IpcConnectionContext
instance Selector S1_0_0IpcConnectionContext
instance Selector S1_0_1IpcConnectionContext
instance Datatype D1RpcKind
instance Constructor C1_0RpcKind
instance Constructor C1_1RpcKind
instance Constructor C1_2RpcKind
instance Datatype D1RpcOperation
instance Constructor C1_0RpcOperation
instance Constructor C1_1RpcOperation
instance Constructor C1_2RpcOperation
instance Datatype D1RpcRequestHeader
instance Constructor C1_0RpcRequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_0RpcRequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_1RpcRequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_2RpcRequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_3RpcRequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_4RpcRequestHeader
instance Datatype D1RequestHeader
instance Constructor C1_0RequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_0RequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_1RequestHeader
instance Selector S1_0_2RequestHeader
instance Datatype D1RpcStatus
instance Constructor C1_0RpcStatus
instance Constructor C1_1RpcStatus
instance Constructor C1_2RpcStatus
instance Datatype D1Error
instance Constructor C1_0Error
instance Constructor C1_1Error
instance Constructor C1_2Error

instance Constructor C1_4Error

instance Constructor C1_6Error

instance Constructor C1_9Error

instance Constructor C1_12Error
instance Constructor C1_13Error
instance Datatype D1RpcResponseHeader
instance Constructor C1_0RpcResponseHeader

instance Selector S1_0_1RpcResponseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_2RpcResponseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_3RpcResponseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_4RpcResponseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_5RpcResponseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_6RpcResponseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_7RpcResponseHeader
instance Enum Error
instance Decode RpcResponseHeader
instance Encode RpcResponseHeader
instance Decode RequestHeader
instance Encode RequestHeader
instance Decode RpcRequestHeader
instance Encode RpcRequestHeader
instance Decode IpcConnectionContext
instance Encode IpcConnectionContext
instance Decode UserInformation
instance Encode UserInformation

module Data.Hadoop.Protobuf.Security

-- | Security token identifier
data Token
Token :: Required 1 (Value ByteString) -> Required 2 (Value ByteString) -> Required 3 (Value Text) -> Required 4 (Value Text) -> Token
tokenIdentifier :: Token -> Required 1 (Value ByteString)
tokenPassword :: Token -> Required 2 (Value ByteString)
tokenKind :: Token -> Required 3 (Value Text)
tokenService :: Token -> Required 4 (Value Text)
data GetDelegationTokenRequest
GetDelegationTokenRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> GetDelegationTokenRequest
gdtRenewer :: GetDelegationTokenRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
data GetDelegationTokenResponse
GetDelegationTokenResponse :: Optional 1 (Message Token) -> GetDelegationTokenResponse
gdtToken :: GetDelegationTokenResponse -> Optional 1 (Message Token)
data RenewDelegationTokenRequest
RenewDelegationTokenRequest :: Required 1 (Message Token) -> RenewDelegationTokenRequest
rdtToken :: RenewDelegationTokenRequest -> Required 1 (Message Token)
data RenewDelegationTokenResponse
RenewDelegationTokenResponse :: Required 1 (Value Word64) -> RenewDelegationTokenResponse
rtdNewExpiryTime :: RenewDelegationTokenResponse -> Required 1 (Value Word64)
data CancelDelegationTokenRequest
CancelDelegationTokenRequest :: Required 1 (Message Token) -> CancelDelegationTokenRequest
cdtToken :: CancelDelegationTokenRequest -> Required 1 (Message Token)
data CancelDelegationTokenResponse
CancelDelegationTokenResponse :: CancelDelegationTokenResponse
instance Generic Token
instance Show Token
instance Generic GetDelegationTokenRequest
instance Show GetDelegationTokenRequest
instance Generic GetDelegationTokenResponse
instance Show GetDelegationTokenResponse

instance Show RenewDelegationTokenRequest
instance Generic RenewDelegationTokenResponse
instance Show RenewDelegationTokenResponse

module Data.Hadoop.Protobuf.Hdfs

-- | Summary of a file or directory
data ContentSummary
ContentSummary :: Required 1 (Value Word64) -> Required 2 (Value Word64) -> Required 3 (Value Word64) -> Required 4 (Value Word64) -> Required 5 (Value Word64) -> Required 6 (Value Word64) -> ContentSummary
csLength :: ContentSummary -> Required 1 (Value Word64)
csFileCount :: ContentSummary -> Required 2 (Value Word64)
csDirectoryCount :: ContentSummary -> Required 3 (Value Word64)
csQuota :: ContentSummary -> Required 4 (Value Word64)
csSpaceConsumed :: ContentSummary -> Required 5 (Value Word64)
csSpaceQuota :: ContentSummary -> Required 6 (Value Word64)

-- | Directory listing.
data DirectoryListing
DirectoryListing :: Repeated 1 (Message FileStatus) -> Required 2 (Value Word32) -> DirectoryListing
dlPartialListing :: DirectoryListing -> Repeated 1 (Message FileStatus)
dlRemaingEntries :: DirectoryListing -> Required 2 (Value Word32)

-- | Status of a file, directory or symbolic link. Optionally includes a
--   files block locations if requested by client on the RPC call.
data FileStatus
FileStatus :: Required 1 (Enumeration FileType) -> Required 2 (Value ByteString) -> Required 3 (Value Word64) -> Required 4 (Message FilePermission) -> Required 5 (Value Text) -> Required 6 (Value Text) -> Required 7 (Value Word64) -> Required 8 (Value Word64) -> Optional 9 (Value ByteString) -> Optional 10 (Value Word32) -> Optional 11 (Value Word64) -> Optional 12 (Message LocatedBlocks) -> FileStatus
fsFileType :: FileStatus -> Required 1 (Enumeration FileType)

-- | local name of inode (encoded java utf8)
fsPath :: FileStatus -> Required 2 (Value ByteString)
fsLength :: FileStatus -> Required 3 (Value Word64)
fsPermission :: FileStatus -> Required 4 (Message FilePermission)
fsOwner :: FileStatus -> Required 5 (Value Text)
fsGroup :: FileStatus -> Required 6 (Value Text)
fsModificationTime :: FileStatus -> Required 7 (Value Word64)
fsAccessTime :: FileStatus -> Required 8 (Value Word64)

-- | if symlink, target (encoded java utf8)
fsSymLink :: FileStatus -> Optional 9 (Value ByteString)

-- | default = 0, only 16bits used
fsBlockReplication :: FileStatus -> Optional 10 (Value Word32)

-- | default = 0
fsBlockSize :: FileStatus -> Optional 11 (Value Word64)

-- | supplied only if asked by client
fsLocations :: FileStatus -> Optional 12 (Message LocatedBlocks)

-- | The type of a file (either directory, file or symbolic link)
data FileType
IS_DIR :: FileType
IS_FILE :: FileType
IS_SYMLINK :: FileType
data ChecksumType
CHECKSUM_NULL :: ChecksumType
CHECKSUM_CRC32 :: ChecksumType
CHECKSUM_CRC32C :: ChecksumType

-- | File or directory permission, same spec as POSIX.
data FilePermission
FilePermission :: Required 1 (Value Word32) -> FilePermission

-- | actually a short, only 16 bits used
fpPerm :: FilePermission -> Required 1 (Value Word32)

-- | A set of file blocks and their locations.
data LocatedBlocks
LocatedBlocks :: Required 1 (Value Word64) -> Repeated 2 (Message LocatedBlock) -> Required 3 (Value Bool) -> Optional 4 (Message LocatedBlock) -> Required 5 (Value Bool) -> LocatedBlocks
lbFileLength :: LocatedBlocks -> Required 1 (Value Word64)
lbBlocks :: LocatedBlocks -> Repeated 2 (Message LocatedBlock)
lbUnderConstruction :: LocatedBlocks -> Required 3 (Value Bool)
lbLastBlock :: LocatedBlocks -> Optional 4 (Message LocatedBlock)
lbLastBlockComplete :: LocatedBlocks -> Required 5 (Value Bool)

-- | Information about a block and its location.
data LocatedBlock
LocatedBlock :: Required 1 (Message ExtendedBlock) -> Required 2 (Value Word64) -> Repeated 3 (Message DataNodeInfo) -> Required 4 (Value Bool) -> Required 5 (Message Token) -> LocatedBlock
lbExtended :: LocatedBlock -> Required 1 (Message ExtendedBlock)

-- | offset of first byte of block in the file
lbOffset :: LocatedBlock -> Required 2 (Value Word64)

-- | locations ordered by proximity to client IP
lbLocations :: LocatedBlock -> Repeated 3 (Message DataNodeInfo)

-- | <a>True</a> if all replicas of a block are corrupt. If the block has a
--   few corrupt replicas, they are filtered and their locations are not
--   part of this object.
lbCorrupt :: LocatedBlock -> Required 4 (Value Bool)
lbToken :: LocatedBlock -> Required 5 (Message Token)

-- | Identifies a block.
data ExtendedBlock
ExtendedBlock :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Word64) -> Required 3 (Value Word64) -> Optional 4 (Value Word64) -> ExtendedBlock

-- | block pool id - globally unique across clusters
ebPoolId :: ExtendedBlock -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | the local id within a pool
ebBlockId :: ExtendedBlock -> Required 2 (Value Word64)
ebGenerationStamp :: ExtendedBlock -> Required 3 (Value Word64)

-- | does not belong, here for historical reasons
ebNumBytes :: ExtendedBlock -> Optional 4 (Value Word64)

-- | Status of a data node.
data DataNodeInfo
DataNodeInfo :: Required 1 (Message DataNodeId) -> Optional 2 (Value Word64) -> Optional 3 (Value Word64) -> Optional 4 (Value Word64) -> Optional 5 (Value Word64) -> Optional 6 (Value Word64) -> Optional 7 (Value Word32) -> Optional 8 (Value Text) -> Optional 9 (Enumeration AdminState) -> DataNodeInfo
dnId :: DataNodeInfo -> Required 1 (Message DataNodeId)

-- | default = 0
dnCapacity :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 2 (Value Word64)

-- | default = 0
dnDfsUsed :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 3 (Value Word64)

-- | default = 0
dnRemaining :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 4 (Value Word64)

-- | default = 0
dnBlockPoolUsed :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 5 (Value Word64)

-- | default = 0
dnLastUpdate :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 6 (Value Word64)

-- | default = 0
dnXceiverCount :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 7 (Value Word32)
dnLocation :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 8 (Value Text)

-- | default = NORMAL
dnAdminState :: DataNodeInfo -> Optional 9 (Enumeration AdminState)
data AdminState
NORMAL :: AdminState
DECOMMISSION_INPROGRESS :: AdminState
DECOMMISSIONED :: AdminState

-- | Identifies a data node
data DataNodeId
DataNodeId :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Text) -> Required 3 (Value Text) -> Required 4 (Value Word32) -> Required 5 (Value Word32) -> Required 6 (Value Word32) -> DataNodeId

-- | IP address
dnIpAddr :: DataNodeId -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | Host name
dnHostName :: DataNodeId -> Required 2 (Value Text)

-- | Storage ID
dnStorageId :: DataNodeId -> Required 3 (Value Text)

-- | Data streaming port
dnXferPort :: DataNodeId -> Required 4 (Value Word32)

-- | Info server port
dnInfoPort :: DataNodeId -> Required 5 (Value Word32)

-- | IPC server port
dnIpcPort :: DataNodeId -> Required 6 (Value Word32)
instance Generic ContentSummary
instance Show ContentSummary
instance Generic FileType
instance Show FileType
instance Eq FileType
instance Generic ChecksumType
instance Show ChecksumType
instance Eq ChecksumType
instance Generic FilePermission
instance Show FilePermission
instance Generic ExtendedBlock
instance Show ExtendedBlock
instance Generic AdminState
instance Show AdminState
instance Eq AdminState
instance Generic DataNodeId
instance Show DataNodeId
instance Generic DataNodeInfo
instance Show DataNodeInfo
instance Generic LocatedBlock
instance Show LocatedBlock
instance Generic LocatedBlocks
instance Show LocatedBlocks
instance Generic FileStatus
instance Show FileStatus
instance Generic DirectoryListing
instance Show DirectoryListing

instance Constructor C1_0ContentSummary
instance Selector S1_0_0ContentSummary
instance Selector S1_0_1ContentSummary
instance Selector S1_0_2ContentSummary
instance Selector S1_0_3ContentSummary

-- | This module contains protocol buffers that are used to transfer data
--   to and from the datanode, as well as between datanodes.
module Data.Hadoop.Protobuf.DataTransfer
data DataTransferEncryptorStatus
DTES_SUCCESS :: DataTransferEncryptorStatus
DTES_ERROR_UNKNOWN_KEY :: DataTransferEncryptorStatus
DTES_ERROR :: DataTransferEncryptorStatus
data DataTransferEncryptorMessage
DataTransferEncryptorMessage :: Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferEncryptorStatus) -> Optional 2 (Value ByteString) -> Optional 3 (Value Text) -> DataTransferEncryptorMessage
dtesStatus :: DataTransferEncryptorMessage -> Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferEncryptorStatus)
dtesPayload :: DataTransferEncryptorMessage -> Optional 2 (Value ByteString)
dtesData :: DataTransferEncryptorMessage -> Optional 3 (Value Text)
data BaseHeader
BaseHeader :: Required 1 (Message ExtendedBlock) -> Optional 2 (Message Token) -> BaseHeader
bhBlock :: BaseHeader -> Required 1 (Message ExtendedBlock)
bhToken :: BaseHeader -> Optional 2 (Message Token)
data ClientOperationHeader
ClientOperationHeader :: Required 1 (Message BaseHeader) -> Required 2 (Value Text) -> ClientOperationHeader
cohBaseHeader :: ClientOperationHeader -> Required 1 (Message BaseHeader)
cohClientName :: ClientOperationHeader -> Required 2 (Value Text)
data CachingStrategy
CachingStrategy :: Optional 1 (Value Bool) -> Optional 2 (Value Int64) -> CachingStrategy
csDropBehind :: CachingStrategy -> Optional 1 (Value Bool)
csReadahead :: CachingStrategy -> Optional 2 (Value Int64)
data OpReadBlock
OpReadBlock :: Required 1 (Message ClientOperationHeader) -> Required 2 (Value Word64) -> Required 3 (Value Word64) -> Optional 4 (Value Bool) -> Optional 5 (Message CachingStrategy) -> OpReadBlock
orbHeader :: OpReadBlock -> Required 1 (Message ClientOperationHeader)
orbOffset :: OpReadBlock -> Required 2 (Value Word64)
orbLen :: OpReadBlock -> Required 3 (Value Word64)
orbSendChecksums :: OpReadBlock -> Optional 4 (Value Bool)
orbCachingStrategy :: OpReadBlock -> Optional 5 (Message CachingStrategy)
data Checksum
Checksum :: Required 1 (Message ChecksumType) -> Required 2 (Value Word32) -> Checksum
csType :: Checksum -> Required 1 (Message ChecksumType)
csBytesPerChecksum :: Checksum -> Required 2 (Value Word32)
data BlockConstructionStage
BCS_PIPELINE_SETUP_APPEND :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | pipeline set up for failed PIPELINE_SETUP_APPEND recovery
BCS_PIPELINE_SETUP_APPEND_RECOVERY :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | data streaming
BCS_DATA_STREAMING :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | pipeline setup for failed data streaming recovery
BCS_PIPELINE_SETUP_STREAMING_RECOVERY :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | close the block and pipeline
BCS_PIPELINE_CLOSE :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | Recover a failed PIPELINE_CLOSE
BCS_PIPELINE_CLOSE_RECOVERY :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | pipeline set up for block creation
BCS_PIPELINE_SETUP_CREATE :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | transfer RBW for adding datanodes
BCS_TRANSFER_RBW :: BlockConstructionStage

-- | transfer Finalized for adding datanodes
BCS_TRANSFER_FINALIZED :: BlockConstructionStage
data OpWriteBlock
OpWriteBlock :: Required 1 (Message ClientOperationHeader) -> Repeated 2 (Message DataNodeInfo) -> Optional 3 (Message DataNodeInfo) -> Required 4 (Enumeration BlockConstructionStage) -> Required 5 (Value Word32) -> Required 6 (Value Word64) -> Required 7 (Value Word64) -> Required 8 (Value Word64) -> Required 9 (Message Checksum) -> Optional 10 (Message CachingStrategy) -> OpWriteBlock
owbHeader :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 1 (Message ClientOperationHeader)
owbTargets :: OpWriteBlock -> Repeated 2 (Message DataNodeInfo)
owbSource :: OpWriteBlock -> Optional 3 (Message DataNodeInfo)
owbStage :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 4 (Enumeration BlockConstructionStage)
owbPipelineSize :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 5 (Value Word32)
owbMinBytesRcvd :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 6 (Value Word64)
owbMaxBytesRcvd :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 7 (Value Word64)
owbLatestGenerationStamp :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 8 (Value Word64)
owbRequestedChecksum :: OpWriteBlock -> Required 9 (Message Checksum)
owbCachingStrategy :: OpWriteBlock -> Optional 10 (Message CachingStrategy)
data OpTransferBlock
OpTransferBlock :: Required 1 (Message ClientOperationHeader) -> Repeated 2 (Message DataNodeInfo) -> OpTransferBlock
otbHeader :: OpTransferBlock -> Required 1 (Message ClientOperationHeader)
otbTargets :: OpTransferBlock -> Repeated 2 (Message DataNodeInfo)
data OpReplaceBlock
OpReplaceBlock :: Required 1 (Message BaseHeader) -> Required 2 (Value Text) -> Required 3 (Message DataNodeInfo) -> OpReplaceBlock
orpHeader :: OpReplaceBlock -> Required 1 (Message BaseHeader)
orpDelHint :: OpReplaceBlock -> Required 2 (Value Text)
orpSource :: OpReplaceBlock -> Required 3 (Message DataNodeInfo)
data OpCopyBlock
OpCopyBlock :: Required 1 (Message BaseHeader) -> OpCopyBlock
ocbHeader :: OpCopyBlock -> Required 1 (Message BaseHeader)
data OpBlockChecksum
OpBlockChecksum :: Required 1 (Message BaseHeader) -> OpBlockChecksum
obcHeader :: OpBlockChecksum -> Required 1 (Message BaseHeader)
data OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
OpRequestShortCircuitAccess :: Required 1 (Message BaseHeader) -> Required 2 (Value Word32) -> OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
orscHeader :: OpRequestShortCircuitAccess -> Required 1 (Message BaseHeader)

-- | In order to get short-circuit access to block data, clients must set
--   this to the highest version of the block data that they can
--   understand. Currently 1 is the only version, but more versions may
--   exist in the future if the on-disk format changes.
orscMaxVersion :: OpRequestShortCircuitAccess -> Required 2 (Value Word32)
data PacketHeader
PacketHeader :: Required 1 (Value (Fixed Int64)) -> Required 2 (Value (Fixed Int64)) -> Required 3 (Value Bool) -> Required 4 (Value (Fixed Int32)) -> Optional 5 (Value Bool) -> PacketHeader
phOffsetInBlock :: PacketHeader -> Required 1 (Value (Fixed Int64))
phSeqno :: PacketHeader -> Required 2 (Value (Fixed Int64))
phLastPacketInBlock :: PacketHeader -> Required 3 (Value Bool)
phDataLen :: PacketHeader -> Required 4 (Value (Fixed Int32))

-- | default = false
phSyncBlock :: PacketHeader -> Optional 5 (Value Bool)
data DataTransferStatus
DT_SUCCESS :: DataTransferStatus
DT_ERROR :: DataTransferStatus
DT_ERROR_CHECKSUM :: DataTransferStatus
DT_ERROR_INVALID :: DataTransferStatus
DT_ERROR_EXISTS :: DataTransferStatus
DT_ERROR_ACCESS_TOKEN :: DataTransferStatus
DT_CHECKSUM_OK :: DataTransferStatus
DT_ERROR_UNSUPPORTED :: DataTransferStatus
data PipelineAck
PipelineAck :: Required 1 (Value (Signed Int64)) -> Optional 2 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus) -> Optional 3 (Value Word64) -> PipelineAck
psSeqno :: PipelineAck -> Required 1 (Value (Signed Int64))
paStatus :: PipelineAck -> Optional 2 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus)

-- | default = 0
paDownstreamAckTimeNanos :: PipelineAck -> Optional 3 (Value Word64)

-- | Sent as part of the BlockOpResponse for READ_BLOCK and COPY_BLOCK
--   operations.
data ReadOpChecksumInfo
ReadOpChecksumInfo :: Required 1 (Message Checksum) -> Required 2 (Value Word64) -> ReadOpChecksumInfo
rociChecksum :: ReadOpChecksumInfo -> Required 1 (Message Checksum)

-- | The offset into the block at which the first packet will start. This
--   is necessary since reads will align backwards to a checksum chunk
--   boundary.
rociChunkOffset :: ReadOpChecksumInfo -> Required 2 (Value Word64)
data BlockOpResponse
BlockOpResponse :: Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus) -> Optional 2 (Value String) -> Optional 3 (Message OpBlockChecksumResponse) -> Optional 4 (Message ReadOpChecksumInfo) -> Optional 5 (Value Text) -> Optional 6 (Value Word32) -> BlockOpResponse
borStatus :: BlockOpResponse -> Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus)
borFirstBadLink :: BlockOpResponse -> Optional 2 (Value String)
borChecksumResponse :: BlockOpResponse -> Optional 3 (Message OpBlockChecksumResponse)
borReadOpChecksumInfo :: BlockOpResponse -> Optional 4 (Message ReadOpChecksumInfo)

-- | Explanatory text which may be useful to log on the client side
borData :: BlockOpResponse -> Optional 5 (Value Text)

-- | If the server chooses to agree to the request of a client for
--   short-circuit access, it will send a response data with the relevant
--   file descriptors attached.
--   
--   In the body of the data, this version number will be set to the
--   specific version number of the block data that the client is about to
--   read.
borShortCircuitAccessVersion :: BlockOpResponse -> Optional 6 (Value Word32)

-- | Message sent from the client to the DN after reading the entire read
--   request.
data ClientReadStatus
ClientReadStatus :: Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus) -> ClientReadStatus
crsStatus :: ClientReadStatus -> Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus)
data DNTransferAck
DNTransferAck :: Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus) -> DNTransferAck
dntaStatus :: DNTransferAck -> Required 1 (Enumeration DataTransferStatus)
data OpBlockChecksumResponse
OpBlockChecksumResponse :: Required 1 (Value Word32) -> Required 2 (Value Word64) -> Required 3 (Value ByteString) -> Optional 4 (Message ChecksumType) -> OpBlockChecksumResponse
obcrBytesPerCrc :: OpBlockChecksumResponse -> Required 1 (Value Word32)
obcrCrcPerBlock :: OpBlockChecksumResponse -> Required 2 (Value Word64)
obcrMd5 :: OpBlockChecksumResponse -> Required 3 (Value ByteString)
obcrCrcType :: OpBlockChecksumResponse -> Optional 4 (Message ChecksumType)
instance Generic DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Show DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Eq DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Generic DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Show DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Generic BaseHeader
instance Show BaseHeader
instance Generic ClientOperationHeader
instance Show ClientOperationHeader
instance Generic CachingStrategy
instance Show CachingStrategy
instance Generic OpReadBlock
instance Show OpReadBlock
instance Generic Checksum
instance Show Checksum
instance Generic BlockConstructionStage
instance Show BlockConstructionStage
instance Eq BlockConstructionStage
instance Generic OpWriteBlock
instance Show OpWriteBlock
instance Generic OpTransferBlock
instance Show OpTransferBlock
instance Generic OpReplaceBlock
instance Show OpReplaceBlock
instance Generic OpCopyBlock
instance Show OpCopyBlock
instance Generic OpBlockChecksum
instance Show OpBlockChecksum
instance Generic OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
instance Show OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
instance Generic PacketHeader
instance Show PacketHeader
instance Generic DataTransferStatus
instance Show DataTransferStatus
instance Eq DataTransferStatus
instance Generic PipelineAck
instance Show PipelineAck
instance Generic ReadOpChecksumInfo
instance Show ReadOpChecksumInfo
instance Generic ClientReadStatus
instance Show ClientReadStatus
instance Generic DNTransferAck
instance Show DNTransferAck
instance Generic OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Show OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Generic BlockOpResponse
instance Show BlockOpResponse
instance Datatype D1DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Constructor C1_0DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Constructor C1_1DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Constructor C1_2DataTransferEncryptorStatus
instance Datatype D1DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Constructor C1_0DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Selector S1_0_0DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Selector S1_0_1DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Selector S1_0_2DataTransferEncryptorMessage
instance Datatype D1BaseHeader
instance Constructor C1_0BaseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_0BaseHeader
instance Selector S1_0_1BaseHeader
instance Datatype D1ClientOperationHeader
instance Constructor C1_0ClientOperationHeader
instance Selector S1_0_0ClientOperationHeader
instance Selector S1_0_1ClientOperationHeader
instance Datatype D1CachingStrategy
instance Constructor C1_0CachingStrategy
instance Selector S1_0_0CachingStrategy
instance Selector S1_0_1CachingStrategy
instance Datatype D1OpReadBlock
instance Constructor C1_0OpReadBlock
instance Selector S1_0_0OpReadBlock
instance Selector S1_0_1OpReadBlock
instance Selector S1_0_2OpReadBlock
instance Selector S1_0_3OpReadBlock
instance Selector S1_0_4OpReadBlock
instance Datatype D1Checksum
instance Constructor C1_0Checksum
instance Selector S1_0_0Checksum
instance Selector S1_0_1Checksum
instance Datatype D1BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_0BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_1BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_2BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_3BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_4BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_5BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_6BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_7BlockConstructionStage
instance Constructor C1_8BlockConstructionStage
instance Datatype D1OpWriteBlock
instance Constructor C1_0OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_0OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_1OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_2OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_3OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_4OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_5OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_6OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_7OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_8OpWriteBlock
instance Selector S1_0_9OpWriteBlock
instance Datatype D1OpTransferBlock
instance Constructor C1_0OpTransferBlock
instance Selector S1_0_0OpTransferBlock
instance Selector S1_0_1OpTransferBlock
instance Datatype D1OpReplaceBlock
instance Constructor C1_0OpReplaceBlock
instance Selector S1_0_0OpReplaceBlock
instance Selector S1_0_1OpReplaceBlock
instance Selector S1_0_2OpReplaceBlock
instance Datatype D1OpCopyBlock
instance Constructor C1_0OpCopyBlock
instance Selector S1_0_0OpCopyBlock
instance Datatype D1OpBlockChecksum
instance Constructor C1_0OpBlockChecksum
instance Selector S1_0_0OpBlockChecksum
instance Datatype D1OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
instance Constructor C1_0OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
instance Selector S1_0_0OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
instance Selector S1_0_1OpRequestShortCircuitAccess
instance Datatype D1PacketHeader
instance Constructor C1_0PacketHeader
instance Selector S1_0_0PacketHeader
instance Selector S1_0_1PacketHeader
instance Selector S1_0_2PacketHeader
instance Selector S1_0_3PacketHeader
instance Selector S1_0_4PacketHeader
instance Datatype D1DataTransferStatus
instance Constructor C1_0DataTransferStatus

instance Constructor C1_2DataTransferStatus
instance Constructor C1_3DataTransferStatus
instance Constructor C1_4DataTransferStatus
instance Constructor C1_5DataTransferStatus

instance Selector S1_0_2PipelineAck

instance Selector S1_0_1ReadOpChecksumInfo

instance Constructor C1_0ClientReadStatus
instance Selector S1_0_0ClientReadStatus

instance Constructor C1_0DNTransferAck
instance Selector S1_0_0DNTransferAck
instance Datatype D1OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Constructor C1_0OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Selector S1_0_1OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Selector S1_0_2OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Selector S1_0_3OpBlockChecksumResponse
instance Datatype D1BlockOpResponse
instance Constructor C1_0BlockOpResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0BlockOpResponse
instance Selector S1_0_1BlockOpResponse
instance Selector S1_0_2BlockOpResponse
instance Selector S1_0_3BlockOpResponse
instance Selector S1_0_4BlockOpResponse
instance Selector S1_0_5BlockOpResponse

instance Encode OpBlockChecksumResponse

instance Encode DNTransferAck

instance Encode ClientReadStatus

instance Encode ReadOpChecksumInfo

instance Encode Checksum

instance Encode CachingStrategy

instance Encode ClientOperationHeader

instance Encode DataTransferEncryptorMessage

instance Enum DataTransferEncryptorStatus

module Data.Hadoop.Protobuf.ClientNameNode
data GetListingRequest
GetListingRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value ByteString) -> Required 3 (Value Bool) -> GetListingRequest

-- | the directory to list
lsSrc :: GetListingRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)

-- | begin the listing after this file (encoded java utf8)
lsStartAfter :: GetListingRequest -> Required 2 (Value ByteString)

-- | return the location data in the cluster
lsNeedLocation :: GetListingRequest -> Required 3 (Value Bool)
data GetListingResponse
GetListingResponse :: Optional 1 (Message DirectoryListing) -> GetListingResponse
lsDirList :: GetListingResponse -> Optional 1 (Message DirectoryListing)
data GetFileInfoRequest
GetFileInfoRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> GetFileInfoRequest
fiSrc :: GetFileInfoRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
data GetFileInfoResponse
GetFileInfoResponse :: Optional 1 (Message FileStatus) -> GetFileInfoResponse
fiFileStatus :: GetFileInfoResponse -> Optional 1 (Message FileStatus)
data GetContentSummaryRequest
GetContentSummaryRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> GetContentSummaryRequest
csPath :: GetContentSummaryRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
data GetContentSummaryResponse
GetContentSummaryResponse :: Required 1 (Message ContentSummary) -> GetContentSummaryResponse
csSummary :: GetContentSummaryResponse -> Required 1 (Message ContentSummary)
data MkdirsRequest
MkdirsRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Message FilePermission) -> Required 3 (Value Bool) -> MkdirsRequest
mdSrc :: MkdirsRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
mdMasked :: MkdirsRequest -> Required 2 (Message FilePermission)
mdCreateParent :: MkdirsRequest -> Required 3 (Value Bool)
data MkdirsResponse
MkdirsResponse :: Required 1 (Value Bool) -> MkdirsResponse
mdResult :: MkdirsResponse -> Required 1 (Value Bool)
data DeleteRequest
DeleteRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Bool) -> DeleteRequest
dlSrc :: DeleteRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
dlRecursive :: DeleteRequest -> Required 2 (Value Bool)
data DeleteResponse
DeleteResponse :: Required 1 (Value Bool) -> DeleteResponse
dlResult :: DeleteResponse -> Required 1 (Value Bool)
data Rename2Request
Rename2Request :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Text) -> Required 3 (Value Bool) -> Rename2Request
mvSrc :: Rename2Request -> Required 1 (Value Text)
mvDst :: Rename2Request -> Required 2 (Value Text)
mvOverwrite :: Rename2Request -> Required 3 (Value Bool)
data Rename2Response
Rename2Response :: Rename2Response
data SetPermissionRequest
SetPermissionRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Message FilePermission) -> SetPermissionRequest
chmodPath :: SetPermissionRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
chmodMode :: SetPermissionRequest -> Required 2 (Message FilePermission)
data SetPermissionResponse
SetPermissionResponse :: SetPermissionResponse
data GetBlockLocationsRequest
GetBlockLocationsRequest :: Required 1 (Value Text) -> Required 2 (Value Int64) -> Required 3 (Value Int64) -> GetBlockLocationsRequest
catSrc :: GetBlockLocationsRequest -> Required 1 (Value Text)
catOffset :: GetBlockLocationsRequest -> Required 2 (Value Int64)
catLength :: GetBlockLocationsRequest -> Required 3 (Value Int64)
data GetBlockLocationsResponse
GetBlockLocationsResponse :: Optional 1 (Message LocatedBlocks) -> GetBlockLocationsResponse
locsLocations :: GetBlockLocationsResponse -> Optional 1 (Message LocatedBlocks)
instance Generic GetListingRequest
instance Show GetListingRequest
instance Generic GetListingResponse
instance Show GetListingResponse
instance Generic GetFileInfoRequest
instance Show GetFileInfoRequest
instance Generic GetFileInfoResponse
instance Show GetFileInfoResponse
instance Generic GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Show GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Generic GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Show GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Generic MkdirsRequest
instance Show MkdirsRequest
instance Generic MkdirsResponse
instance Show MkdirsResponse
instance Generic DeleteRequest
instance Show DeleteRequest
instance Generic DeleteResponse
instance Show DeleteResponse
instance Generic Rename2Request
instance Show Rename2Request
instance Generic Rename2Response
instance Show Rename2Response
instance Generic SetPermissionRequest
instance Show SetPermissionRequest
instance Generic SetPermissionResponse
instance Show SetPermissionResponse
instance Generic GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Show GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Generic GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Show GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Datatype D1GetListingRequest
instance Constructor C1_0GetListingRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0GetListingRequest
instance Selector S1_0_1GetListingRequest
instance Selector S1_0_2GetListingRequest
instance Datatype D1GetListingResponse
instance Constructor C1_0GetListingResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0GetListingResponse
instance Datatype D1GetFileInfoRequest
instance Constructor C1_0GetFileInfoRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0GetFileInfoRequest
instance Datatype D1GetFileInfoResponse
instance Constructor C1_0GetFileInfoResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0GetFileInfoResponse
instance Datatype D1GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Constructor C1_0GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Datatype D1GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Constructor C1_0GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Datatype D1MkdirsRequest
instance Constructor C1_0MkdirsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0MkdirsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_1MkdirsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_2MkdirsRequest
instance Datatype D1MkdirsResponse
instance Constructor C1_0MkdirsResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0MkdirsResponse
instance Datatype D1DeleteRequest
instance Constructor C1_0DeleteRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0DeleteRequest
instance Selector S1_0_1DeleteRequest
instance Datatype D1DeleteResponse
instance Constructor C1_0DeleteResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0DeleteResponse
instance Datatype D1Rename2Request
instance Constructor C1_0Rename2Request
instance Selector S1_0_0Rename2Request
instance Selector S1_0_1Rename2Request
instance Selector S1_0_2Rename2Request
instance Datatype D1Rename2Response
instance Constructor C1_0Rename2Response
instance Datatype D1SetPermissionRequest
instance Constructor C1_0SetPermissionRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0SetPermissionRequest
instance Selector S1_0_1SetPermissionRequest
instance Datatype D1SetPermissionResponse
instance Constructor C1_0SetPermissionResponse
instance Datatype D1GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Constructor C1_0GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_0GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_1GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Selector S1_0_2GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Datatype D1GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Constructor C1_0GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Selector S1_0_0GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Decode GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Encode GetBlockLocationsResponse
instance Decode GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Encode GetBlockLocationsRequest
instance Decode SetPermissionResponse
instance Encode SetPermissionResponse
instance Decode SetPermissionRequest
instance Encode SetPermissionRequest
instance Decode Rename2Response
instance Encode Rename2Response
instance Decode Rename2Request
instance Encode Rename2Request
instance Decode DeleteResponse
instance Encode DeleteResponse
instance Decode DeleteRequest
instance Encode DeleteRequest
instance Decode MkdirsResponse
instance Encode MkdirsResponse
instance Decode MkdirsRequest
instance Encode MkdirsRequest
instance Decode GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Encode GetContentSummaryResponse
instance Decode GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Encode GetContentSummaryRequest
instance Decode GetFileInfoResponse
instance Encode GetFileInfoResponse
instance Decode GetFileInfoRequest
instance Encode GetFileInfoRequest
instance Decode GetListingResponse
instance Encode GetListingResponse
instance Decode GetListingRequest
instance Encode GetListingRequest

module Data.Hadoop.Types
type NameNode = Endpoint
type SocksProxy = Endpoint
data Endpoint
Endpoint :: !HostName -> !Port -> Endpoint
epHost :: Endpoint -> !HostName
epPort :: Endpoint -> !Port
type HostName = Text
type Port = Int
data HadoopConfig
HadoopConfig :: !User -> ![NameNode] -> !(Maybe SocksProxy) -> HadoopConfig
hcUser :: HadoopConfig -> !User
hcNameNodes :: HadoopConfig -> ![NameNode]
hcProxy :: HadoopConfig -> !(Maybe SocksProxy)
data ConfigError
ConfigError :: !Text -> ConfigError
data RemoteError
RemoteError :: !Text -> !Text -> RemoteError
data DecodeError
DecodeError :: !Text -> DecodeError
data ConnectionClosed
ConnectionClosed :: ConnectionClosed
type User = Text
type Group = Text
type Permission = Word16

-- | Path to a file/directory on HDFS, stored as UTF8.
type HdfsPath = ByteString

-- | Microseconds since 1 January 1970.
type HdfsTime = Word64

-- | The type of a file (either directory, file or symbolic link)
data FileType
Dir :: FileType
File :: FileType
SymLink :: FileType

-- | Summary of a file or directory
data ContentSummary
ContentSummary :: !Word64 -> !Word64 -> !Word64 -> !Word64 -> !Word64 -> !Word64 -> ContentSummary
csLength :: ContentSummary -> !Word64
csFileCount :: ContentSummary -> !Word64
csDirectoryCount :: ContentSummary -> !Word64
csQuota :: ContentSummary -> !Word64
csSpaceConsumed :: ContentSummary -> !Word64
csSpaceQuota :: ContentSummary -> !Word64

-- | Partial directory listing.
data PartialListing
PartialListing :: !Int -> !(Vector FileStatus) -> PartialListing

-- | number of files left to fetch
lsRemaining :: PartialListing -> !Int
lsFiles :: PartialListing -> !(Vector FileStatus)

-- | Status of a file, directory or symbolic link.
data FileStatus
FileStatus :: !FileType -> !HdfsPath -> !Word64 -> !Permission -> !User -> !Group -> !HdfsTime -> !HdfsTime -> !(Maybe HdfsPath) -> !Word16 -> !Word64 -> FileStatus
fsFileType :: FileStatus -> !FileType
fsPath :: FileStatus -> !HdfsPath
fsLength :: FileStatus -> !Word64
fsPermission :: FileStatus -> !Permission
fsOwner :: FileStatus -> !User
fsGroup :: FileStatus -> !Group
fsModificationTime :: FileStatus -> !HdfsTime
fsAccessTime :: FileStatus -> !HdfsTime

-- | if symlink, target
fsSymLink :: FileStatus -> !(Maybe HdfsPath)
fsBlockReplication :: FileStatus -> !Word16
fsBlockSize :: FileStatus -> !Word64
instance Typeable ConfigError
instance Typeable RemoteError
instance Typeable DecodeError
instance Typeable ConnectionClosed
instance Eq Endpoint
instance Ord Endpoint
instance Show Endpoint
instance Show ConfigError
instance Eq ConfigError
instance Data ConfigError
instance Show RemoteError
instance Eq RemoteError
instance Data RemoteError
instance Show DecodeError
instance Eq DecodeError
instance Data DecodeError
instance Show ConnectionClosed
instance Eq ConnectionClosed
instance Data ConnectionClosed
instance Eq HadoopConfig
instance Ord HadoopConfig
instance Show HadoopConfig
instance Eq FileType
instance Ord FileType
instance Show FileType
instance Eq ContentSummary
instance Ord ContentSummary
instance Show ContentSummary
instance Eq FileStatus
instance Ord FileStatus
instance Show FileStatus
instance Eq PartialListing
instance Ord PartialListing
instance Show PartialListing
instance Exception ConnectionClosed
instance Exception DecodeError
instance Exception RemoteError
instance Exception ConfigError

module Data.Hadoop.HdfsPath

-- | Path to a file/directory on HDFS, stored as UTF8.
type HdfsPath = ByteString
(</>) :: HdfsPath -> HdfsPath -> HdfsPath
combine :: HdfsPath -> HdfsPath -> HdfsPath

module Network.Hadoop.Socket
data Socket :: *
bracketSocket :: (MonadMask m, MonadIO m) => Maybe SocksProxy -> Endpoint -> (Socket -> m a) -> m a
connectSocket :: (MonadMask m, MonadIO m) => Maybe SocksProxy -> Endpoint -> m Socket
closeSocket :: MonadIO m => Socket -> m ()


-- | Lightweight abstraction over an input/output stream. (stolen from
--   <tt>websockets</tt> package)
module Network.Hadoop.Stream

-- | Lightweight abstraction over an input/output stream.
data Stream
mkStream :: IO (Maybe ByteString) -> (Maybe ByteString -> IO ()) -> IO Stream
mkSocketStream :: Socket -> IO Stream
mkEchoStream :: IO Stream
parse :: Stream -> Parser a -> IO (Maybe a)
maybeGet :: Stream -> Get a -> IO (Maybe a)
runGet :: Stream -> Get a -> IO a
runPut :: Stream -> Put -> IO ()
write :: Stream -> ByteString -> IO ()
close :: Stream -> IO ()

module Network.Hadoop.Rpc
data Connection
Connection :: !Int -> !HadoopConfig -> !Protocol -> !(Method -> RawRequest -> (RawResponse -> IO ()) -> IO ()) -> Connection
cnVersion :: Connection -> !Int
cnConfig :: Connection -> !HadoopConfig
cnProtocol :: Connection -> !Protocol
invokeRaw :: Connection -> !(Method -> RawRequest -> (RawResponse -> IO ()) -> IO ())
data Protocol
Protocol :: !Text -> !Int -> Protocol
prName :: Protocol -> !Text
prVersion :: Protocol -> !Int
type User = Text
type Method = Text
type RawRequest = ByteString
type RawResponse = Either SomeException ByteString
initConnectionV9 :: HadoopConfig -> Protocol -> Socket -> IO Connection
invokeAsync :: (Decode b, Encode a) => Connection -> Text -> a -> (Either SomeException b -> IO ()) -> IO ()
invoke :: (Decode b, Encode a) => Connection -> Text -> a -> IO b
instance Eq Protocol
instance Ord Protocol
instance Show Protocol

module Data.Hadoop.Configuration
getHadoopConfig :: IO HadoopConfig
getHadoopUser :: IO User
getNameNodes :: IO [NameNode]

module Network.Hadoop.Hdfs
newtype Hdfs a
Hdfs :: (Connection -> IO a) -> Hdfs a
unHdfs :: Hdfs a -> Connection -> IO a
hdfsProtocol :: Protocol
getConnection :: Hdfs Connection
runHdfs :: Hdfs a -> IO a
runHdfs' :: HadoopConfig -> Hdfs a -> IO a
hdfsInvoke :: (Encode a, Decode b) => Text -> a -> Hdfs b
type CreateParent = Bool
type Recursive = Bool
type Overwrite = Bool
getListing :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs (Maybe (Vector FileStatus))
getListing' :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs (Vector FileStatus)
getListingRecursive :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs (TBQueue (Maybe (HdfsPath, Either SomeException (Vector FileStatus))))
getFileInfo :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs (Maybe FileStatus)
getContentSummary :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs ContentSummary
mkdirs :: CreateParent -> HdfsPath -> Hdfs Bool
delete :: Recursive -> HdfsPath -> Hdfs Bool
rename :: Overwrite -> HdfsPath -> HdfsPath -> Hdfs ()
setPermissions :: Word32 -> HdfsPath -> Hdfs ()
instance MonadMask Hdfs
instance MonadCatch Hdfs
instance MonadThrow Hdfs
instance MonadIO Hdfs
instance Monad Hdfs
instance Applicative Hdfs
instance Functor Hdfs

module Network.Hadoop.Read
data HdfsReadHandle

-- | Open an HDFS path for reading. This retrieves the block locations for
--   an HDFS path, but does not yet initiate any data transfers.
openRead :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs (Maybe HdfsReadHandle)

-- | Map an action over the contents of a file on HDFS.
hdfsMapM_ :: (Functor m, MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => (ByteString -> m ()) -> HdfsReadHandle -> m ()
hdfsFoldM :: (Functor m, MonadIO m, MonadMask m) => (a -> ByteString -> m a) -> a -> HdfsReadHandle -> m a

-- | Print the contents of a file on HDFS to stdout
hdfsCat :: HdfsPath -> Hdfs ()
